welcomeh1: Hi! My name is Carl and I am...
welcome1: ...a { INSERT_AGE } years old engineering student studying at the University of Waterloo. To be clear, what you are looking at is my pitful attempt of creating a website from scratch.
welcome2: I'm just (sorta) kidding. In case if you were still (or ever) wondering, I love playing the piano, video games, and working on personal projects!
welcome_msg: Wondering about the hanging ellipsis? My v1 website had this typewriter effect in place of those three dots. I thought I was being original until I found out wasn't! As thus this shall be my temporary placeholder until I come up with a unique way to make this welcome page better.
